name: Mixing Madness (Kieran Boyce)
description:
A local 2-player versus game based on  The Shining. You will play a bartender from one of the movie's most famous scenes.  The aim of the game is to mix ingredients to make drinks, serve them to Jack Torrance and sway his mental status; The blue bartender keeping him sane, whilst the red driving him insane.

Controls  (Controller required)

  • Left Joystick:  Navigate menus
  • 'A' Xbox controller: Select in menus / Pick up or place down items in game
  • 'B' Xbox controller: Cancel selection / Back out of menu
  • 'X'  Xbox controller: Use stations / Poison drinks in game
